name: Dropper Faller
description:
Hey, let's fly through the retrowave tunnel, but it will be difficult because of some obstacles. Let's see, how many score you will earn! Go, go, go!

Controls:

Mouse - for control the fly

"Esc" or "P" - for pause

"Backspace" - to main menu

Avoid colliding in obstacles! Some holes in obstacles can give you extra score! You have 3 lives and by the time you will get faster and faster.

Credits to: Aries Beats, Edge of Tomorrow, Electronic Senses, Home Head, JOA and Mabeha, LessionX, Trixtor for the music.
